reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress absolutely gorgeous, particularly appreciating its emerald green color and thick structured velvet material.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous dress!
items.body: I'm 5"8 and weigh 175. This dress is a size large and fits perfectly. This dress flatters every inch of your body. I love this dress it's very elegant and well made. I highly suggest this dress for an after five dinner party or a date night. Read more
items.author: Susan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, crushed velvet dress
items.body: This was a beautiful dress and fit was true to size. I did not end up using it for the event, I plan to wear it for, so I did send it back. But it would be perfect for a holiday party or fall wedding. There is quite a bit of stretch, but not so much so that it becomes baggy. It hugs all the right ways. Absolutely would recommend purchasing it. Read more
items.author: Stefani Storm

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars CUTE DRESS!!
items.body: This dress is so comfy, cute & flattering! Wore it for my company holiday party & now I want to order more colors! I’m size 14/16 & XL fit me perfectly! Get it! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pleasantly surprised
items.body: This dress is well made, lots of stretch but also form fitting, hides the tummy and imperfections very well. Not a high quality velvet feeling fabric but doesn’t appear cheap. The best part of the dress is the sleeves, gives it a sexy playful vibe, perfect for holiday parties or any cocktail event. Read more
items.author: DeeMarie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful well made dress
items.body: Beautiful dress. I got many compliments and it fit well! Read more
items.author: joe

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress soft material fits true to size. You can probably go smaller.
items.body: Beautiful dress I bought two sizes. One slave was ripped, but it could be sewn. Read more
items.author: angela houseworth shepherd

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Itchy sleeves
items.body: This dress was cute and different, but the sleeves were horribly itchy. I couldn't last five minutes, I had to get it off and send it back. Read more
items.author: Corinne

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars ture to size
items.body: Loved this dress, it fit perfect and is beautiful. Very well made. I received many compliments on it. Read more
items.author: barbara g

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Ruched V Neck Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Ruched V Neck Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Ruched V Neck Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Emerald-green, Wine Red, Purple Red, Royal Blue, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
